1503090.name: SinSeed
1503090.description:
SinSeed will be shut down on Aug 2, 2021

i decide the remove SinSeed because we couldn't reach enough players to enjoy this game.
Thank you for all your feedbacks, until Aug 2 Character Progress will be saved (level, experiances, quests etc.) and leaderboard for season 2 also continue.

Until next time! Good Luck & Have Fun!


SinSeed Developed by one person, your feedback is very important to me, please contact me for any question info@sin-seed.com

SinSeed is a battle royale game with no time limits.

An island awaits you that you will fight endlessly.

A never-ending battle royale game, you are the only one to rule this world!
Think of a battle royale game, when you face off against thousands of online players and rule the kingdom, you are now their worst enemy.

Start with the character class that's right for you.

Defeat enemies and survive on SinSeed island!

Upgrade your items, be the King, rule the island.
1503090.supported_languages:
英语*, 土耳其语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
